text: Stelios Serafidis (; 6 August 1935 – 4 January 2022) was a Greek international footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for AEK Athens from 1953 until 1972. Serafidis played for the national team once in 1963. He was born in Athens, Greece. Serafidis died on 4 January 2022 in Athens from prostate cancer at the age of 86.Πέθανε ο Στέλιος Σεραφείδης ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Greece Category:Greek football managers Category:Footballers from Athens
title: Stelios Serafidis
